text: My Vegas act is how I make my money.
author: Rita Rudner

text: No woman marries for money they are all clever enough, before marrying a millionaire, to fall in love with him first.
author: Cesare Pavese

text: But all the money in the world cannot make you happy either, so there has to be a balance.
author: Heidi Klum

text: Making a movie requires 20 to 500 people to make and a lot of money and the stakes are a lot higher.
author: Alanis Morissette

text: Music has always been my back door to life. It is important for people to find something that excites them. I like the concept that if you do what excites you, you will be rewarded generously, whatever form reward takes, which is not necessarily money.
author: Brandon Boyd
